entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending before morning then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls. Amount 10 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
